title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie
